config.script:
self.custom.function = 0
	self.params.reservationId = -1
	self.session.custom.dateRangeFromDate = system.date.now()
	self.session.custom.dateRangeToDate = system.date.now()

self.view.params.reservationId = -1
	self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Note").props.params.CaseNote = ''
	self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Dates Input").props.params.beginDate = system.date.now()
	self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Dates Input").props.params.endDate = system.date.now()
	system.perspective.sendMessage("reservationselected",payload = {'facilityId':-1,'reservationId':-1, 'bedId':-1, 'participantId':-1, 'roomId':-1},scope='session')

project = "RITI"
	self.parent.custom.ReservationSaved = 0
	Refresh = 1
	#system.perspective.print('started')
	## Check if parameters are filled in correctly 
	genderMismatch = False
	if int(self.view.getChild("root").custom.selectedParticipantId) < 0:
		#system.perspective.print('participant invalid')
		valid = False
	elif int(self.view.getChild("root").custom.selectedRoomId) < 0:
		#system.perspective.print('room invalid')
		valid = False
	elif int(self.view.getChild("root").custom.selectedBedId) < 0:
		#system.perspective.print('bed invalid')
		valid = False
	elif self.view.getChild("root").custom.selectedBeginDate is None:
		#system.perspective.print('start date invalid')
		valid = False
	elif self.view.getChild("root").custom.selectedEndDate is None:
		#system.perspective.print('end date invalid')
		valid = False
	elif self.view.getChild("root").custom.selectedEndDate  <= self.view.getChild("root").custom.selectedBeginDate:
		#system.perspective.print('start and end date same')
		valid = False
	#elif self.view.getChild("root").custom.selectedBeginDate  < system.date.format(system.date.now(), "MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss"):
	#elif system.date.isBefore(self.view.getChild("root").custom.selectedEndDate , self.view.getChild("root").custom.selectedBeginDate):
		#system.perspective.print('past start date')
		#valid = False
	else:
		
		path = "Shelter/Reservations/SelectGenderOfParticipant"
		parameters = {"participantId": self.view.getChild("root").custom.selectedParticipantId}
		participantGender = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters)	
		pGender = participantGender.getValueAt(0,0)
		path = "Shelter/Reservations/SelectGenderOfRoom"
		parameters = {"roomId": self.view.getChild("root").custom.selectedRoomId}
		roomGender = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters)
		rGender = roomGender.getValueAt(0,0)
		
		if pGender == "Female" and rGender == "M":
			valid = False
			genderMismatch = True
		elif pGender == "Male" and rGender == "F":
			valid = False	
			genderMismatch = True
		else:
			valid = True	
			genderMismatch = False
		
	### Check if data is valid otherwise show error message.
	if valid:
		system.perspective.print('data valid')
		try:
			### Check if the user is creating new data
			if int(self.view.params.reservationId) == -1:
				path = "Shelter/Reservations/CreateNewReservation"
				parameters = {"bedId": self.view.getChild("root").custom.selectedBedId,"participantId": self.view.getChild("root").custom.selectedParticipantId,"notes": self.view.getChild("root").custom.addedNotes,"reservationStart":self.view.getChild("root").custom.selectedBeginDate, "reservationEnd":self.view.getChild("root").custom.selectedEndDate}
				#system.perspective.print(parameters)
				NewReservation = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters)		
				
				self.view.params.reservationId  = NewReservation
				self.parent.custom.ReservationSaved = 1
				self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Reservation Saved Successfully")
			##### Check if the user is editing existing data
			elif int(self.view.params.reservationId) > -1:
				path = "Shelter/Reservations/UpdateReservation"
				parameters = {"bedId": self.view.getChild("root").custom.selectedBedId,"participantId": self.view.getChild("root").custom.selectedParticipantId,"notes": self.view.getChild("root").custom.addedNotes,"reservationStart":self.view.getChild("root").custom.selectedBeginDate, "reservationEnd":self.view.getChild("root").custom.selectedEndDate, "reservationID" : self.view.params.reservationId}
				#system.perspective.print(parameters)
				NewReservation = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters)
				self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Reservation Updated Successfully")
				self.parent.custom.ReservationSaved = 1		
			##### The view is openend with a value in the Function parameter that isn't recognized
			else:
				self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.")
				Refresh = 0
				
			##### Refresh the table
			if Refresh != 0:	
				system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType="refreshReservations", payload={}, scope="session")
		except:
			self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("...Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again...")	
	else:
		if genderMismatch:
			self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Selected Room is not set for " +pGender+ " Participant")
		else:
		 	self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Please fill in all the fields correctly before saving.")

try:
		system.perspective.print("In delete .... for reservation " + str( self.view.params.reservationId))
		project = 'RITI'
		path = "Shelter/Reservations/DeleteReservation"
		parameters = {"reservationId": int(self.view.params.reservationId)}
		system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters)		
		self.view.params.reservationId  = -1
		
		self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Note").props.params.CaseNote = ''
		self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Dates Input").props.params.beginDate = system.date.now()
		self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Dates Input").props.params.endDate = system.date.now()
		system.perspective.sendMessage("reservationselected",payload = {'facilityId':-1,'reservationId':-1, 'bedId':-1, 'participantId':-1, 'roomId':-1},scope='session')
		
		system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType="refreshReservations", payload={}, scope="session")	
	except:
		self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while deleting data. Please select & try again.")

props.text: Please fill in all the fields correctly before saving.

customMethods.name: showMessage
customMethods.script:
import time
	self.props.text = message
	self.meta.visible = True
	time.sleep(5)
	self.meta.visible = False

messageHandlers.script:
# implement your handler here
	self.view.params.reservationId = payload['reservationId']
	self.getChild("EmbeddedView Note").props.params.CaseNote = payload['notes']
	#system.perspective.print(system.date.parse(payload['checkInDate']))
	#self.getChild("EmbeddedView Dates Input").props.params.beginDate = system.date.parse(payload['checkInDate'],"yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss")
	#self.getChild("EmbeddedView Dates Input").props.params.endDate = payload['checkOutDate']
	self.session.custom.dateRangeFromDate = payload['checkInDate']
	self.session.custom.dateRangeToDate = payload['checkOutDate']
